text: wed allah bialnasr aladhin amanuu minkum waeamiluu al'aemal alsaalihata, bi'ana yurithahum 'ard almushrikina, wayajealuhum khulafa' fiha, mithlama faeala mae 'aslafihim min almuminin biallah warusuliha, wa'an yajeal dinahum aladhi artadah lahuma- wahu al'iislama- dynana ezyzana mkynana, wa'ana yubadil halihim min alkhawf 'iilaa al'amini, 'iidha eabiduu allah wahdahu, wastaqamuu ealaa taeatih, walam yushrikuu maeah shyyana, waman kafar baed dhlk alastikhlaf wal'amn waltamakin walsiltanat altaamati, wajahad nieam allaha, fa'uwliik hum alkharijun ean taeat allaha
